name: Reverse (yesa)
description:
Reverse is a 2D-platformer where you can move a portal to invert the nature and color of some parts of the environment. Use that portal to move through the obstacles and reach the end of the level!

It is a solo 3 days game jam project on the theme "filter" I made as a student. The development is on hold, but I'll be continuing it in the future.

Controls : Xbox 360 controller required to play.

Left Joystick to move the character

Right joystick to move the portal

RT to jump

Start to get back to the last activated checkpoint
